titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the minimum Federal medical assistance percentage under the Medicaid Program for States to 53 percent.
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the minimum Federal medical assistance percentage under the Medicaid Program for States to 53 percent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Secuirty Act to increase the minimum federal medical assistance percentage (FMAP) under the Medicaid program for states from 50% to 53%.
